title: 2023 Fall ENGIN 26 104 LAB 104 | UCB Class Search
main_content: 2023 Fall ENGIN 26 104 LAB 104 2023 Fall ENGIN 26 104 - LAB 104 Three-Dimensional Modeling for Design Parth Behani Aug 23, 2023 - Dec 08, 2023 Th 03:00 pm - 04:59 pm Etcheverry 1171 Class #: 28944 Units: 2 Instruction Mode: In-Person Instruction Offered through Engineering Current Enrollment Total Open Seats: 6 Enrolled: 33 Waitlisted: 0 Capacity: 39 Waitlist Max: 20 No Reserved Seats Hours & Workload 1 hours of instructor presentation of course materials per week, 3 hours of outside work hours per week, and 2 hours of instructional experiences requiring special laboratory equipment and facilities per week. Other classes by Parth Behani ENGIN 26 101 101LAB ENGIN 26 102 102LAB Course Catalog Description Three-dimensional modeling for engineering design. This course will emphasize the use of CAD on computer workstations as a major graphical analysis and design tool. Students develop design skills, and practice applying these skills. A group design project, design and fabrication (3D print) of the tower and rotor is required. Hands-on creativity, teamwork, and effective communication are emphasized. Rules & Requirements Repeat Rules Course is not repeatable for credit. Reserved Seats Current Enrollment No Reserved Seats Textbooks & Materials See class syllabus or https://calstudentstore.berkeley.edu/textbooks for the most current information.
